728590f-a.title: Richmond: Belmont Place - Daniel Low Terrace
728590f-a.text: 2 Belmont Place (extreme left), at the S.E. corner of Daniel Low Terrace, showing the A.C. Pouch residence.  April 2, 1930.
728590f-a.folder: Belmont Place & Daniel Low Terrace, Staten Island, NY

728591f-c.title: Richmond: Belmont Place - Daniel Low Terrace
728591f-c.text:
(1)
2 Belmont Place, at the S.E. corner of Daniel Low Terrace,
showing the A.C. Pouch residence.
May 25, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, another view.
May 26, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
A view of the house in a westerly direction.
May 26, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.
728591f-c.folder: Belmont Place & Daniel Low Terrace, Staten Island, NY

728593f-a.title: Richmond: Belmont Place - Daniel Low Terrace
728593f-a.text:
(1)
37 Belmont Place, north side, between Daniel Low Terrace and Vine Street, showing the Pouch residence. Another Pouch
residence is at No. 2 Belmont Place.
August 6, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, a more distant view. The street at this point
makes a sharp bend southward.
August 6, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
728593f-a.folder: Belmont Place & Daniel Low Terrace, Staten Island, NY
